verses.verse: And it came<WH1961> about in the days<WH3117> of Amraphel<WH569> king<WH4428> of Shinar,<WH8152> Arioch<WH746> king<WH4428> of Ellasar,<WH495> Chedorlaomer<WH3540> king<WH4428> of Elam,<WH5867> and Tidal<WH8413> king<WH4428> of Goiim,<WH9074>

[that] they made<WH6213> war<WH4421> with Bera<WH1298> king<WH4428> of Sodom,<WH5467> and with Birsha<WH1306> king<WH4428> of Gomorrah,<WH6017> Shinab<WH8134> king<WH4428> of Admah,<WH126> and Shemeber<WH8038> king<WH4428> of Zeboiim,<WH6636> and the king<WH4428> of Bela<WH9055> (that is, Zoar<WH6820>).
All<WH3605> these<WH428> came<WH2266> as allies<WH2266> to the valley<WH6010> of Siddim<WH7708> (that is, the Salt<WH4417> Sea<WH3220>).
Twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> years<WH8141> they had served<WH5647> Chedorlaomer,<WH3540> but the thirteenth<WH7969> <WH6240> year<WH8141> they rebelled.<WH4775>

And in the fourteenth<WH702> <WH6240> year<WH8141> Chedorlaomer<WH3540> and the kings<WH4428> that were with him, came<WH935> and defeated<WH5221> the Rephaim<WH7497> in Ashteroth-karnaim and the Zuzim<WH2104> in Ham<WH1990> and the Emim<WH368> in Shaveh-kiriathaim,
and the Horites<WH2752> in their Mount<WH2022> Seir,<WH8165> as far<WH5704> as El-paran, which<WH834> is by the wilderness.<WH4057>

Then they turned<WH7725> back<WH7725> and came<WH935> to En-mishpat (that is, Kadesh<WH6946>), and conquered<WH5221> all<WH3605> the country<WH7704> of the Amalekites,<WH6003> and also<WH1571> the Amorites,<WH567> who lived<WH3427> in Hazazon-tamar.

And the king<WH4428> of Sodom<WH5467> and the king<WH4428> of Gomorrah<WH6017> and the king<WH4428> of Admah<WH126> and the king<WH4428> of Zeboiim<WH6636> and the king<WH4428> of Bela<WH9055> (that is, Zoar<WH6820>) came<WH3318> out; and they arrayed<WH6186> for battle<WH4421> against<WH854> them in the valley<WH6010> of Siddim,<WH7708>

against<WH854> Chedorlaomer<WH3540> king<WH4428> of Elam<WH5867> and Tidal<WH8413> king<WH4428> of Goiim<WH9074> and Amraphel<WH569> king<WH4428> of Shinar<WH8152> and Arioch<WH746> king<WH4428> of Ellasar<WH495> â€“ four<WH702> kings<WH4428> against<WH854> five.<WH2568>

Now the valley<WH6010> of Siddim<WH7708> was full of tar<WH2564> pits;<WH875> and the kings<WH4428> of Sodom<WH5467> and Gomorrah<WH6017> fled,<WH5127> and they fell<WH5307> into them. But those who survived<WH7604> fled<WH5127> to the hill<WH2022> country.<WH2022>
Then they took<WH3947> all<WH3605> the goods<WH7399> of Sodom<WH5467> and Gomorrah<WH6017> and all<WH3605> their food<WH400> supply,<WH400> and departed.<WH1980>
And they also took<WH3947> Lot,<WH3876> Abram's nephew,<WH1121> <WH251> and his possessions<WH7399> and departed,<WH1980> for he was living<WH3427> in Sodom.<WH5467>

Then a fugitive<WH6412> came<WH935> and told<WH5046> Abram<WH87> the Hebrew.<WH5680> Now he was living<WH7931> by the oaks<WH436> of Mamre<WH4471> the Amorite,<WH567> brother<WH251> of Eshcol<WH812> and brother<WH251> of Aner,<WH6063> and these<WH1992> were allies<WH1167> <WH1285> with Abram.<WH87>

And when Abram<WH87> heard<WH8085> that his relative<WH251> had been taken<WH7617> captive,<WH7617> he led<WH9553> out his trained<WH2593> men,<WH2593> born<WH3211> in his house,<WH1004> three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> and eighteen,<WH8083> <WH6240> and went<WH7291> in pursuit<WH7291> as far<WH5704> as Dan.<WH1835>

And he divided<WH2505> his forces against<WH5921> them by night,<WH3915> he and his servants,<WH5650> and defeated<WH5221> them, and pursued<WH7291> them as far<WH5704> as Hobah,<WH2327> which<WH834> is north<WH8040> of Damascus.<WH1834>

And he brought<WH7725> back<WH7725> all<WH3605> the goods,<WH7399> and also<WH1571> brought<WH7725> back<WH7725> his relative<WH251> Lot<WH3876> with his possessions,<WH7399> and also<WH1571> the women,<WH802> and the people.<WH5971>

Then after<WH310> his return<WH7725> from the defeat<WH5221> of Chedorlaomer<WH3540> and the kings<WH4428> who<WH834> were with him, the king<WH4428> of Sodom<WH5467> went<WH3318> out to meet<WH7122> him at the valley<WH6010> of Shaveh<WH7740> (that is, the King's Valley<WH6010>).
And Melchizedek<WH4442> king<WH4428> of Salem<WH8004> brought<WH3318> out bread<WH3899> and wine;<WH3196> now he was a priest<WH3548> of God<WH410> Most<WH9411> High.<WH9411>
And he blessed<WH1288> him and said,<WH559> "Blessed<WH1288> be Abram<WH87> of God<WH430> Most<WH9411> High,<WH9411> Possessor<WH7069> of heaven<WH8064> and earth;<WH776>
And blessed<WH1288> be God<WH430> Most<WH9411> High,<WH9411> Who<WH834> has delivered<WH4042> your enemies<WH6862> into your hand.<WH3027>" And he gave<WH5414> him a tenth<WH4643> of all.<WH3605>
And the king<WH4428> of Sodom<WH5467> said<WH559> to Abram,<WH87> "Give<WH5414> the people<WH5315> to me and take<WH3947> the goods<WH7399> for yourself."

And Abram<WH87> said<WH559> to the king<WH4428> of Sodom,<WH5467> "I have sworn<WH7311> <WH3027> to the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> Most<WH9411> High,<WH9411> possessor<WH7069> of heaven<WH8064> and earth,<WH776>
that I will not take<WH3947> a thread<WH2339> or a sandal<WH5275> thong<WH8288> or anything<WH3605> that is yours, lest<WH3808> you should say,<WH559> 'I have made<WH6238> Abram<WH87> rich.<WH6238>'

"I will take nothing<WH1107> except<WH1107> what<WH834> the young<WH5288> men<WH5288> have eaten,<WH398> and the share<WH2506> of the men<WH376> who<WH834> went<WH1980> with me, Aner,<WH6063> Eshcol,<WH812> and Mamre;<WH4471> let them take<WH3947> their share.<WH2506>"
